title: More Prison Time for Paul Manafort & Details from the College Bribery Scam | Karamo Brown
itunes:title: More Prison Time for Paul Manafort & Details from the College Bribery Scam | Karamo Brown
description:
Paul Manafort gets a second prison sentence, Michael Kosta reacts to the college admissions bribery scandal, and "Queer Eye" star Karamo Brown discusses his memoir "Karamo."
